text: Freylinia is a genus of flowering plants in the figwort family Scrophulariaceae. They are native to Africa. ==Species== Species include: *Freylinia crispaFreylinia crispa PlantZAfrica.com *Freylinia decurrens *Freylinia densifloraFreylinia densiflora PlantZAfrica.com *Freylinia helmeiFreylinia helmei PlantZAfrica.com *Freylinia lanceolataFreylinia lanceolata PlantZAfrica.com *Freylinia longifloraFreylinia longiflora PlantZAfrica.com *Freylinia tropicaFreylinia tropica PlantZAfrica.com *Freylinia undulataFreylinia undulata PlantZAfrica.com *Freylinia visseriFreylinia visseri PlantZAfrica.com *Freylinia vlokiiFreylinia vlokii PlantZAfrica.com ==References== Category:Medicinal plants Category:Scrophulariaceae genera
title: Freylinia
